copy: ### You can read more about our core criteria [here](https://www.comicrelief/link-tbc).
#### Our funding fits across our key themes of Children Survive & Thrive, New Approaches to Mental Health, Gender Justice, A Safe Place to Be for the Most Vulnerable.
#### You can see which funding opportunities are open [here](https://www.comicrelief/link-tbc).
